title: KB Lager
text:
KB Lager, named after the '<a href="Kent%20Brewery">Kent Brewery</a>', was once one of the most popular beers in NSW. It was popularised amongst a younger demographic by the fictional beer-swilling <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> legend <a href="Reg%20Reagan">Reg Reagan</a> as his beer of choice.
KB sponsored rugby league tournament <a href="Amco%20Cup">KB Cup</a> (1982–83)
